1602730.name: Different Stories VR
1602730.description:
Different Stories VR - is a mellowing, relaxing game. It's also a training of the mind. There are stories hidden in the floating lands. Take a closer look and discover mysterious stories from the past, solving not only visual puzzles.
In our game you will get to know 6 differrent stories. You will be given tools such as a magnifying glass to help you look for differences, especially in the interiors. While testing your eyes and your mind, you will relax to our music. Watch out for the dynamic weather!
1602730.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 韩语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
